text: Thinking of You, Waiting for You (TC: 想着你等着你) is an album recorded by Edmond Leung and released on 6 March 1991. This is his debut album with Capital Artists. 梁漢文「破產」：怪自己死蠢 The Gold Disc Edition was released by East Asia Music on 15 Jul 2011 in order to celebrate Capital Artists 40th Anniversary. Thinking of You, Waiting for You (Gold Disc Edition) ==Track listing== #Thinking of You, Waiting for You (想着你等着你) #It's my fault (算我錯了) #I'm used to being Unrestrained (我習慣瀟灑) #Wrong Lover (錯做情人) #Goodbye School Days #Can't Forget (不能忘) #Sad Love (戀愁) #Fascination (著迷) #Embankment at Night (長夜堤岸) #Still In My Heart (仍留在我心) ==References== Category:Edmond Leung albums Category:1991 albums
title: Thinking of You, Waiting for You
